mapper.sql: ID, DELETED, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, DEL_REASON, FIRST_INSERT, LAST_MODIFIED, CURRENCY_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ADDRESS, DEFAULT_ADDRESS_FLAG
mapper.insert: insert into TBL_WALLET_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY (ID, DELETED, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_USER, DEL_REASON, FIRST_INSERT, LAST_MODIFIED, CURRENCY_ID, ACCOUNT_ID, ADDRESS,DEFAULT_ADDRESS_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{defaultAddressFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update TBL_WALLET_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY set DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_USER = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_USER = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_REASON = #{delReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FIRST_INSERT = #{firstInsert,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CURRENCY_ID = #{currencyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_ADDRESS_FLAG = #{defaultAddressFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from TBL_WALLET_ACCOUNT_CURRENCY where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELETED = '0'
